mapper.select: select fv.id, fv.name, fv.unit, fk.id fee_key_id, fk.name fee_key_name from fee_value fv left join fee_key fk on fk.id = fv.fee_key_id where fk.is_deleted = 0 and fv.is_deleted = 0 and fv.id in (select fee_value_id from apartment_fee_value where apartment_id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0)
